com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.stash

Class AbstractSharedStash<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,STORAGE extends IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>,QUERY extends IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.stash.AbstractSharedStash<DESC,DATA,STORAGE,QUERY>
  • Type Parameters:
    DESC -
    DATA -
    STORAGE -
    QUERY -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedBeanStash, SharedTupleStash

    public abstract class AbstractSharedStash<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,STORAGE extends IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>,QUERY extends IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A thin layer over an ISharedDataPlatform to provide the ability to get named data from across the network of reach nodes also running this application.

    This must be started using the start() method before using. The stop() method should be called when complete.

    Author:
    dawood
